title: @videndum/release-mastermind
description: Welcome to the Github Action Mastermind collection. This is the mono-repository for Videndum's collection of superpowered actions. This collection is built to work together as an universal tool for Github Project management. For simplicity, our main tool - Release Mastermind - incorporates all our other tools within one simple action, which can be used in all your workflows to manage all your common tasks.
